name: GRN
description:
A rainbow-roguelike inspired by games like Binding of Isaac and SNKRX, You play as GRN who is fighting through every color of the rainbow to be THE LAST COLOR STANDING! Make pit stops at the upgrade and gun shops to become stronger to take over the rainbow. Once you defeat every color of the rainbow, enter the DOUBLE RAINBOW!!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

  • WASD to move
  • Arrow keys to shoot
  • SHOOT ALL THE THINGS!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

"OH MY GOD SO MUCH GREEN"

- Guy who hates the color green, 1/10

"Pretty solid game tbh"

- Jebidiah, 8/10

"The colors make me feel silly"

- [REDACTED], 4/10

"I might hate Christmas but boy do I love this!"

- The Grinch, 11/10

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

All art and programming is done by me (GooseStranger)

Sound effects by https://rupert-spore.itch.io/
